title: Grateful Dead Live at Shea's Buffalo Theater on 1979-01-20
source: Source:  FOB Cass. Master > DAT > Soundforge > CDR > Cdparanoia > SHN; Recorded by Eddie Claridge. Split 30' on the balcony with Sony ECM-280 mics > Sony tc158; EQ'd and turned up the volume with hard limiting, balancing the channels; noise reduction using the hiss from the beginning of disc 1 as a sample; numerous cuts between songs crossfaded to smooth out the flow
